ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge for Rimworld of Magic
ModMetaData.author: KyPH Phoenix
ModMetaData.description:
Badges for the pawn classes on "A Rimworld of Magic". This mod is intended for dinguish any pawn with any class. You can use it for pawns that don't have class too xd.
This mod isn't standalone and requires the original mod or the Fan Fork to be used.
